Liquid Flame

Liquid Flame is an environmental effect in Remixed Pixel Dungeon that causes burning damage to characters who come into contact with it.

Description

Liquid Flame is a magical fire effect that appears as a burning liquid on dungeon floors. It typically results from throwing a Potion of Liquid Flame at a location or other fire-based mechanics. Characters standing on Liquid Flame tiles take damage each turn they remain in contact with it.

Mechanics

  • Damage: 1 damage per turn to any character standing on the tile
  • Duration: Typically lasts 5-8 turns before extinguishing naturally
  • Spread: Can spread to adjacent flammable terrain
  • Ignition: Will ignite any flammable environmental elements it touches
  • Area: Usually affects a 3×3 area when created by a potion

Interactions

  • Water: Water-based elements and potions can extinguish Liquid Flame
  • Potions: Potion of Frost and Potion of Purity can extinguish it
  • Ice: Frost-based mechanics can freeze and remove Liquid Flame
  • Burning Status: Characters in Liquid Flame gain the Burning status effect

Strategy

  • Offensive: Use to damage enemies in groups
  • Defensive: Create barriers to prevent enemy approach
  • Environmental: Useful in combination with other area effects
  • Caution: Avoid trapping yourself or allies in the flames

Related

  • Potion of Liquid Flame - Item that creates liquid flame
  • Fire - General fire mechanics
  • Burning Status Effect - Status effect caused by fire
  • Potion of Purity - Can extinguish liquid flame
  • Potion of Frost - Can extinguish liquid flame
